title: RollerCoaster Tycoon 3 Platinum GOG
description:
== About the game:

Rollercoaster Tycoon 3: Platinum! is probably the most deep and complex theme park simulator ever conceived. At the same time it is surprisingly fun and accessible. You will build, manage, and even experience all of the elements that make for a world-class theme park.
Endless possibilities await. You can create your own roller coasters: from gentle flume rides to heart-chilling, gut-busting wild mouse rides that fling you around like dice in a cup. Then add other rides, food stands, and amenities to create the ultimate magical experience for your guests.
Building fun stuff is not the only thing you will do in Rollercoaster Tycoon 3: Platinum! Your theme park needs proper management: you will hire people, juggle incomes and expenses and, most importantly, keep your visitors happy.
Customisation is a big thing in Rollercoaster Tycoon 3: Platinum! Not only you can create your own rollercoasters, you can also set up scenic routes and even make your own firework and laser shows.


== Features:

The platinum edition includes two expansion packs: Soaked! and Wild!, each with its own set of scenarios, cool rides, and objects to place around your virtual theme park.
Surprisingly deep and complex strategy game, yet very light hearted, colorful, and accessible.
Endless construction possibilities. Build the rollercoaster of your dreams: you choose the route, configure the slopes, add loops, barrel rolls, and other thrilling elements. You can even ride your roller coaster along with your guests!
Hundreds of types of rides, coasters, food stands, firework shows, decorations, and amenities.


== Version:

GOG setup 2.0.0.13 - current official


== Instructions:

It's a GOG version, just launch setup
Click options to chose location and accept EULA, install
Play - Enjoy - Seed 
You know what I need - Speed! Give me what I need! Yeah!


== System Requirements:

Minimum:
Pentium 4 2.0GHz/Athlon XP 2500+
GeForce 8600 GTS 512MB/Radeon HD 2900 XT 512MB
1 GB RAM 
Win Xp 32
DirectX 9
1GB hard disk space


 If you enjoyed the game then share with others by seeding! Or better yet 
support game development and BUY IT!

Game developed by 
Frontier Developments 
and published by 
Atari
